attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: address a serious security issue, by introducing a bar code identification system, to prevent someone stealing another persons luggage from an airport baggage reclaim area.

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call to action, not your name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
